CmdLine: apt-get update && 	apt-get --yes install	apt-utils && 	apt-get --yes install	bluetooth 							gdebi-core 							openjdk-8-jre-headless 							procps 							usbutils && 	wget -q http://download.eclipse.org/kura/releases/${KURA_VERSION}/kura_${KURA_VERSION}_raspberry-pi-2-3-nn_installer.deb && 	yes | gdebi kura_${KURA_VERSION}_raspberry-pi-2-3-nn_installer.deb && 	rm kura_${KURA_VERSION}_raspberry-pi-2-3-nn_installer.deb && 	apt-get --yes remove	gdebi-core && 	apt-get --yes autoremove && 	apt-get --yes clean
Commands.Name: run
